definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: The city still stands though much changed.
sentences.chinese: 那個城市雖然歷經滄海桑田依然健在。
這些植物歷經寒霜而存活了。

sentences.english: Holy stream temple has more than ten outlet through millennium still limpid.
sentences.chinese: 聖泉寺中有十多個出水口，歷經千年依然清澈。

sentences.english: After experiencing lots of bitterness and sorrow, they finally reached the West.
sentences.chinese: 兩人歷經千辛萬苦，終於到達西天。

sentences.english: It was like an old man and had seen all kinds of departure.
sentences.chinese: 它就像個歷經滄桑的老人，親歷過各種離愁別緒。

sentences.english: China's aircraft leasing business has an experience of more than 20 years, but still in its infancy.
sentences.chinese: 中國的飛機租賃業歷經20餘年，仍處於起步階段。

sentences.english: After several generations, some geniuses are born to rewrite history.
sentences.chinese: 歷經數代之後，一些可以改寫歷史的天才誕生了。

sentences.english: This old pine has undergone extreme weather but still stands tall and straight.
sentences.chinese: 這棵百年老松歷經了百年風雨依然樹身勁拔。

sentences.english: Five years on, the card is an increasingly sought-after document.
sentences.chinese: 歷經5年，中國綠卡正變得越來越搶手。

sentences.english: The federalization of modern Switzerland took more than 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 現代瑞士國家的形成前後歷經二百餘年。

sentences.english: After 60 years, moreover, the United Nations is still an experiment.
sentences.chinese: 而且，儘管歷經60年，聯合國至今仍是一個試驗。

sentences.english: Glass has a development history of over 3000 years in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國玻璃器的發展歷經三千多年。

sentences.english: Behind the target of socialist law-governing state, there lies historical desperate decision.
sentences.chinese: 我國社會主義法治國家目標的確立歷經艱難的選擇。

sentences.english: This railway station remains standing despite having experienced numerous earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 這座火車站雖然歷經多次地震，卻仍屹立不搖。

sentences.english: Since Chukan now, "Red River Valley" has already experienced two years of wind and rain.
sentences.chinese: 自出刊至今，《紅河谷》已歷經兩年的風雨。

sentences.english: Some giant trees in today’s forest are as much as 800 years old.
sentences.chinese: 現今森林中的一些巨木已經歷經800輪春秋。

definition: to extend as long as/to lengthen out to
to settle/to precipitate (solid sediment out of a solution)
